Reviews.Title: “Clean and Functional”
Reviews.Author: HKSmithers
Reviews.Content: hotel clean functional price job stayed cheap clean fairly comfortable service average facilities poor service pay looking cheap safe clean stay fine location steps else location pretty poor

Reviews.Title: “Will NEVER go again!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kates1Suffolk
Reviews.Content: stayed ibis london doing exhibition arrived wasnt greeted woman reception rude couldnt understand travel industry customer service ate hotel try save money paying ridiculous amount 8 chips tiny piece chicken waitress rude ok special overall staff terrible return hotel telling clients avoid

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: SLMC2010
Reviews.Content: stayed ibis excel nights travelling hours arrived checkin kindly found free lovely clean bathroom perfectly functional shower staff courteous definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “excellent value”
Reviews.Author: N0rtherner
Reviews.Content: booked hotel online accor website 6 days stay deal £45 arrival check swift reception spacious busy internet section cafe bar parking underneath ibis door £14 night reception stamp card paying bought glass rose wine cost pricey bought bottle price evening dessert 1130pm nice cheap 247 food spacious huge comfy kingsize bed linen soft nice pillows ok bathroom huge shower shower cream dispenser wall wasnt happy getting towel dry shower head falling holder cracking head email complain response 3 days tv pay view options internet connection charge tea coffee facilities didnt sleep heating constantly price paid
